content.rendered:
I know I made my own territory button, but it would be nice if I wouldn’t have had to…. That’s why there is the amazing IdeaExchange for us to vote for features and functionality we want, like a new territory button.

Vote to have a “New Territory” button added to the Enterprise Territory Management Territory Model page layout!  It would be so much easier to create a new Territory if there was a button right on the Territory Model page layout for us to click.

Currently the only option is to hover over the territory just right to find the “Create Territory” link.

With a “New Territory” button, right by all the other buttons on the page, it would be easy peasy to create a new territory, right from the Territory Model.

Vote for the Idea here: https://success.salesforce.com/ideaView?id=08730000000oMVlAAM

In the meantime, you can create your own button using the instructions in my post here.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Idea:  Enterprise Territory Mangement Rule Opportunity Filter
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Just posted a new Idea, thanks to the Territory Management Group, to have the Run Opportunity Filter class button visible all the time on the territory hierarchy with help text to explain the button is only available to push when the model is active. Care to vote? https://success.salesforce.com/ideaView?id=08730000000oMVqAAM

jetpack-related-posts.title: I have to go where to make a territory?!
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Don't be frustrated about the steps to create your territories from your territory model, use a button!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Save Yourself Some Time & Increase Report Type Usability
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Custom report types can be your BFF, helping you report on things you never thought you could in Salesforce, but you need to take the time to increase their usability. It only takes one, then you can clone... :-)

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Documentation and User Help
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Greetings Post Readers, I told you I would be back to let you know about Org Documentation and Help Sites so here I am. When it comes to org documentation I have to tell you, mine is either SO BEYOND THROUGH that it would kill many trees to print, OR…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Named Account Model Implementation: Part 1 – Before We Begin
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Implementation of a Named Account Model is a large undertaking. It can be stressful for even the most experienced admin, but it doesn't have to be. This post reviews the concept of what a named account model is and high level requirements before planning your project.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Custom Lightning Layouts & Usability Ideas
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce's Lightning Experience is beautiful. There are a few ideas out there to make it even better. Learn about page layouts and a few of the top ideas to vote for regarding them in this post.
